Description: Wooden anthropoid coffin of Amenemipet; painted detail on plaster; Hieroglyphic text; attached hands lost.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1990 24 Mar-10 Jun, Australia, Canberra, National Gallery of Australia, Civilization: Ancient Treasures from the British Museum (bottom only), cat no.40 1990 28 Jun-23 Sep, Australia, Melbourne, Museum of Victoria, Civilization: Ancient Treasures from the British Museum (bottom only), cat no.40 1997 13 Oct-1998 5 Jan, India, New Delhi, National Museum, The Enduring Image 1998 9 Feb-3 May, India, Mumbai, Sir Caswasjee Jahangir Hall, The Enduring Image
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Raymond G B Sabatier
